name: triathlon-coach
description: Endurance training system for multi-sport athletes with Strava, Garmin, Notion, and Google Calendar integration

skills.name: tempo
skills.description: Endurance training system for multi-sport athletes. Manages goals, assesses fitness, builds periodized plans, tracks progress, and provides coaching support. Use when user asks about training, workouts, races, fitness, or goals. Integrates with Strava, Garmin, Notion, and Google Calendar.
